sect1.title: The controller
sect1.para: This diagram shows the interaction between the Controller class that receives the incoming http request and all the other classes that manage the event creation and its procession.

listitem.para: The EventEngine, invoked by the Controller servlet, parses a request to find out which event(s) need to be instanciated. The fine-grained parsing (parsing of additional data, etc) is done by the WebEvent-Object itself (in order to hide complexity from this class and to keep the framework open for implementations of new Event-classes)
